why-me.passion_about: Coding has become a surprising interest of mine. To challenge logic and creativity to solve complex problems as well as learning something new every day is what keeps my interest up.

my-skills.learning_p: Exploring new technologies, furthering my skills and reworking ideas into even simpler solutions is what drives me as a developer.

projects.organised: How I have organised my work progress

project_card_1.aboutThisProject: This Pokédex is a self-built web app that fetches and displays data from the public PokéAPI. Users can scroll through a growing list of Pokémon, view detailed stats, and explore types and base values — all built without any frameworks, using only HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.
project_card_1.howIOrganised: I began with a clean HTML and CSS layout to establish the basic structure and responsive design. Then I implemented API integration using JavaScript, including dynamic loading, error handling, and a modular code structure for better reusability and clarity. UI improvements and testing were done iteratively during development.
project_card_1.learnings: This project strengthened my understanding of asynchronous data handling with fetch, Promises, and async/await. I also improved my skills in DOM manipulation, event handling, and organizing code into modular functions — all while building a more complex app architecture from scratch.

project_card_2.aboutThisProject: “El Pollo Loco” is a custom-built 2D side-scrolling game created entirely with HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. Players control a main character through an animated level, collecting items, avoiding hazards, and facing enemies — all enriched with sound effects, game logic, and win/loss conditions.
project_card_2.howIOrganised: I started by designing the game logic and implementing player controls and collision detection. Then I added animations, audio, and keyboard-based input. The project was gradually structured into classes and modules to keep the code clean, scalable, and easy to maintain.
project_card_2.learnings: This project deepened my understanding of object-oriented programming in JavaScript, game loops, canvas rendering, and event-driven architecture. I also gained valuable experience in performance tuning and creating responsive, interactive gameplay.

project_card_3.aboutThisProject: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project_card_3.howIOrganised: To keep the code clean and maintainable, I divided the project into reusable Angular components and services. Clear folder structures, meaningful variable and class names, and consistent formatting made the code easy to understand. Comments documented key functions, and recurring logic was outsourced in a modular fashion to avoid redundancies.
project_card_3.groupWorkExperience: We were a team of four people and worked in an agile manner with a clear division of tasks. My main responsibility was developing the summary view, the task board overview, and the filter functions. We used Angular, TypeScript, Firebase, and SCSS. Regular team meetings enabled us to quickly gather feedback and find solutions together.

project_card_4.aboutThisProject: I am currently working on DA Bubble, a chat and collaboration platform similar to Slack. My focus is on implementing real-time communication features, an intuitive user interface, and high-performance data management. For me, the key to success is careful planning, clean code structure, and continuous testing to ensure high code quality. I also place great importance on constantly learning and applying new technologies and best practices—this keeps my development process innovative and efficient.

mate-refs.h4: Need a teamplayer? Here is what my colleagues said about me
mate-refs.span: Here is what my colleagues said about me

credential_1.comment: Kilian is diligent, eager to learn, and has a keen eye for detail. He quickly immerses himself in new topics, adapts code cleanly and comprehensibly, and is a true team player. His pleasant manner makes collaboration a genuine pleasure.

credential_2.comment: Working with you was an unforgettable experience. Your patience and calm way of explaining and solving challenges are a true gift to any team. With your expertise, you consistently drove the team forward – I look forward to tackling more exciting projects together.

credential_3.comment: Kilian was very reliable and committed throughout the entire group project. He consistently delivered a strong performance, was friendly, helpful and supported me organizing the tasks. Working with him was a real pleasure.

contact-me.contact: Are you looking for soemeone who not only executes ideas but also thinks ahead? I am open to project inquiries in the field of web development. Whether it is as a collaborations or a permanent position - I look forward to hearing from you

legal-notice.span: Information in accordance with Section 5 of the German Digital Services Act (DDG)

privacy-policy.p_1: Personal data (usually referred to just as „data“ below) will only be processed by us to the extent necessary and for the purpose of providing a functional and user-friendly website, including its contents, and the services offered there.
privacy-policy.p_2_2: of Regulation (EU) 2016/679, i.e. the General Data Protection Regulation (hereinafter referred to as the „GDPR“), „processing“ refers to any operation or set of operations such as collection, recording, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation, alteration, retrieval, consultation, use, disclosure by transmission, dissemination, or otherwise making available, alignment, or combination, restriction, erasure, or destruction performed on personal data, whether by automated means or not.
privacy-policy.p_3: The following privacy policy is intended to inform you in particular about the type, scope, purpose, duration, and legal basis for the processing of such data either under our own control or in conjunction with others. We also inform you below about the third-party components we use to optimize our website and improve the user experience which may result in said third parties also processing data they collect and control.
privacy-policy.p_4: Our privacy policy is structured as follows:

privacy-policy.p_12: Your data processed when using our website will be deleted or blocked as soon as the purpose for its storage ceases to apply, provided the deletion of the same is not in breach of any statutory storage obligations or unless otherwise stipulated below.
